text.div:
ActionBehaviorType

The type of behavior to be defined

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-behavior-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
grouping Grouping BehaviorSpecifies grouping behavior using the action-group-behavior valueset
selection Selection BehaviorSpecifies selection behavior using the action-selection-behavior valueset
required Required BehaviorSpecifies required behavior using the action-required-behavior valueset
precheck Precheck BehaviorSpecifies precheck behavior using the action-precheck-behavior valueset
cardinality Cardinality BehaviorSpecifies cardinality behavior using the action-cardinality behavior valueset

name: ActionBehaviorType
description: The type of behavior to be defined

concept.definition: Specifies grouping behavior using the action-group-behavior valueset
Specifies selection behavior using the action-selection-behavior valueset
Specifies required behavior using the action-required-behavior valueset
Specifies precheck behavior using the action-precheck-behavior valueset
Specifies cardinality behavior using the action-cardinality behavior valueset
